column1: | title=Tolkien 2005: The Ring Goes Ever On
'''Tolkien 2005: The Ring Goes Ever On''' was a convention hosted by [[The Tolkien Society]]. It was held at Aston University (Birmingham
column3: [[2005]]. The convention marked the fiftieth anniversary of the complete publication of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

column1: Due to work commitments [[John Howe]] and [[Brian Sibley]] were unable to attend.<ref name="Souvenir2">[[The Tolkien Society]]
*''[[The Ring Goes Ever On: Proceedings of the Tolkien 2005 Conference]]''
